transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Executive: Hello

Executive: Hello yes sir, bataiye.
Customer: Haan, se baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Raza Barval se baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan haan mere paas save hai aapka number bataiye.
Customer: Haan haan haan haan.
Customer: Aap kaun baat kar rahe hai? Kya naam hai aapka?
Executive: Saransh baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: To jo ye mere aapki jo assistant thi Palak se usse ye wo number leke aapse contact kiya hai. Palak ne to mujhe aisa kuch kaha ki Palak ne kaha tha mujhe aapko mai pure waqt batata hu ki wo form bharne se pehle bhi form bharne ke baad bhi unhone yahi kaha tha aapko agar business na mile to aapko refund milega.
Executive: Isme koi do nahi hai. Aapke paas kahi written mein hai sir aapke paas?
Customer: Ji?
Executive: Aapke paas kahi written mein hai inki iski inhone commitment kiya tha refund ka?
Customer: Likhat mein?
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To likhat mein mai kaha se launga? Mai usse mila thodi hu. Jab unhone aapko bola hoga to aapne bola hoga na ki agar nahi mila to business refund mana kiya to kya hoga?
Executive: Sir aap business ke liye paisa de rahe hai ye jaane ki baat hai right sir? To aap commitment hoga na aapke company se.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi mai wo mere paas kaha se aayega mere ko ye batao. Dekho yahi pata jis employee ke kehne pe aapne paise diye hai us employee se written mein nahi leni chahiye thi fir ye cheez.
Executive: Sir actually dekhiye refund ki koi policy nahi hoti. Abhi aap mujhe bol rahe hai ki unhone aapko bola mai us cheez pe kaise trust karunga mere paas koi written availability ho visibility ke liye ki unhone ye cheez likh kar di hai ki aapko business nahi mila aap refund le lena.
Customer: Mai baat kar leta hu aage.
Executive: Sir aapke jo ye jo sir words hai sir aap sabse pehle meri baat suniye. Hum koi trust karke aapko paise dete hai humko business bhi mila to sir aapko sir business dekhiye ye samajhiye. Aur leads vagera bhi aa rahe hai to sir dekho fraud wala aa raha hai fir sir.
Executive: Fraud wala aa raha hai matlab?
Customer: Fraud wale aa rahe hai sir fir. Kyuki pehle baat kaunsi aa rahi thi ab baat kaunsi aa rahi hai. Nahi baat hai sir.
Executive: Matlab samjhe nahi mai fraud kaunsa aa raha hai aapke paas?
Customer: Fraud aapki baat mein aa raha hai sir. Pehle aapne bharne se pehle kaha tha aapki itne itne de de aur aapne aapne kya unhone ki aapko agar nahi mila to aapko refund milega usme kya hai. Aapke paas kahi written mein hai ye cheez sir mai kaise matlab aapke paas koi recording ya kuch aur ki wo mujhe aap de do fir.
Executive: Mai kaise matlab ye trust karu ki aapko unhone bola aur yaha ki refund process hai kyuki visibility mein maturity ke basis pe company refund allow hi nahi karti hai.
Customer: Sir allow sab karti sir aap mere ko wo kya bolte hai wo mere ko sab pata hai usme aap mat padhiye ki allow nahi karte. Mujhe sab pata hai kyuki logo ka wapas aaya hai aur sabko milta hai sir agar nahi milta to mujhe nahi mil gaya to baat hai.
Executive: Aisa nahi hai aisa nahi hai. Mere paas to yaha possible nahi hai refund ke liye mai baki ek baar aapke liye baat kar lunga but chances bahut kam hai kyuki kal bhi maine baat kari thi to unhone clearly bola tha ki nahi hai refund ki policy.
Customer: Dekho sir wo jahan tak mera partner tha main mudde ki baat hai mere ko to refund chahiye to chahiye matlab wo aapko karna padega aapki company wo sir aapki company karna hi padega nahi sir. Nahi nahi kar payenge sir. Maturity
Executive: Karna hi padega. Aisa kaise nahi karna padega hamare ko paise chahiye. Sir maturity ke basis pe nahi kar payenge yahi to bol raha hu mai aapko.
Customer: Ye kis basis pe?
Executive: Maturity ke basis pe refund possible nahi hai.
Customer: Sir maturity maturity ke basis pe yaar sale lene mere ko mera refund chahiye baat ye hai kyuki mere ko business nahi mil pa raha to to mere ko. Dekhiye business conversion ki business conversion ke basis pe refund nahi ho pata hai. Aapka catalog bhi mai working kar sakta hu aap chahe to apna. Nahi nahi working kya ye 50 baar ye working 50 baar ye working working sab kar diya unhone.
Executive: Ye sab wo baar baar chutiya banani hai baar baar phone khol ke ab ye baar baar aap pressureize kar rahe hai. Nahi sahi sahi baat kar raha hu to insan ka temperature kabhi bhi out ho sakta hai sir. Mai aapse isi tarah sahi sahi baat kar raha hu. Ye idhar se mere ko ye chutiya bana diya hai bilkul ke aisa karo. Sir aapne abhi mujhe jo aapne abhi jo bataya na ki agar aapke paas kahi written mein hai ki haa unhone refund aapko commit kiya hua hai aap please mujhe proof de dijiye. Aapse to meri aaj baat ho rahi hai aap kaha se mere ko comment karoge ya recommend karoge ye batao ki mere ko ye batao. Ki services aati hai head office mein mere paas map hai to take care to mujhe hi karna padega unhone to bech diye aapko services aapne precaution lena tha na ki aapne jo services liye hai agar mere ko business hi nahi mai kis liye ye bhara mere ko ye batao aap. Sir dekhiyega hum aapko visibility provide karte hai so that ki koi customer agar aap logo ka search kare to hum aap logo ko wo visibility aage forward kar sake aur aapko business mila sake. Dekhiye conversion ki guarantee hum 30000 wale package mein bhi nahi dete aur 20 lakh wale package mein bhi nahi dete. Are 20 lakh wala 30000 wala wo sab chhodo. Baat jo hai wo ye hai ki humko bola gaya tha agar business nahi milega isme to aapko refund milega ab aap bol rahe likhit mein vikhit mein hum to ye to aapki jo ye IndiaMART hai wo trusted hi hai na koi fake to nahi hai ye fraud wala thodi kaam karte ho aap. Baat wo nahi hai hum jo customer ko jo bhi. Nahi aap IndiaMART aap IndiaMART mein aap trust wala kaam karte ho na mere ko ye batao. Written mein dete hai bol to raha hu jo trust wala kaam karte hai humko sari cheeze written mein provide karte hai. Haan to fir jo aapki jo assistant bole wo to mai maan lunga na usme mai kya bolunga ki mere ko likh ke do sir aap. Aap business kar rahe hai aap mujhe bataiye aise kisi pe bhi aap trust karke apna paisa provide kara denge. Sir itni authorized company usme trust nahi karenge to fir kispe trust karenge. Aapne aapne proposal liya hoga na written unse aapne likhit mein liya hoga na ki aap mujhe ye likhit mein kaha se lunga mere ko batao mai likhit mein kaise lunga aur unko kaise form unhone kaha unhone kaha ki aise aise policy hai hamare paas to maine kaha theek hai fir apne ko kya rahega. Sir aapko likhit mein lena chahiye tha refund ki policy mere paas nahi hai maturity ke basis pe mere liye possible kam hai mai ye sir kal ek baar already discussion kar chuka hu mai ek baar dobara discussion karke aapko update kar deta hu but mere paas koi surety nahi hai ki mai aapko refund kara paunga mai fir aapko bol raha hu mai try kar sakta hu but mai surety nahi de sakta. Nahi sir fir mere ko complaint karwana padega sir fir. Wo jaise aapko theek lage sir. Haan sir wo mere ko complaint karwana padega fir mai complaint karwana padega. Sir complaint already aapne kari hui hai complaint open hai recording line par hi aapse baat ho raha hai. Mai aapko sahi karne ke liye ready hu but aap agar mujhse refund maang rahe hai to mujhe koi proof dijiye at least so that mai aapko refund provide kar saku. Waise to matlab aap ye samajhiye na 2.5 lakh customer hai agar kisi ko jara sa bhi problem aayega wo aake turant bol dega ki aap mujhe refund de dijiye kyuki mujhe business nahi mila. Jara sa problem kaisa problem mere ko business hi nahi mil raha mere ko lead hi nahi aa raha jiske liye mai paisa pay kar raha hu mere ko wahi nahi mil pa raha kya baat kar rahe ho aap? Kya cheez nahi mil pa raha? Mere ko business nahi mil pa raha mere ko lead hi nahi aa rahi. Business conversion ki guarantee IndiaMART nahi deta. Are sir ye jo ye alag alag baatein mat karo aap mere ko jo baat thi ki mere ko week to week lead aayegi. Aap mujhe proof de dijiye sir. Ji? Aap mujhe proof de dijiye ki unhone ye cheez boli aap recording hi de dijiye agar ho to aapke paas. Mai abhi unse baat karta hu aapko fir mai wapas call karta hu. Aap baat kar lo unse koi problem nahi hai haa baat kar lo. Palak ka number
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund due to no business.

- Claims executive promised refund if no business.

- Customer alleges fraudulent leads.



Resolution:

- Executive stated there is no refund policy.

- Executive will discuss the refund with team.

- Executive mentioned maturity basis for refund.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update customer after discussion.



Alert (If Any):

refund, complaint, fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, fraud, policy
